top.title: Ukraine's ex-energy minister detained while attempting to leave country
top.summary: His detention comes as he faces legal proceedings after being dismissed in a corruption scandal.

top.title: FBI analysing recovered glove that appears to match those worn in Guthrie suspect video
top.summary: The FBI says it recovered a DNA sample from the glove, which was found in a field a few miles from Guthrie's home.

top.title: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
top.summary: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".

top.title: No free pass for internet platforms on child safety, Starmer says
top.summary: The government announces a consultation on online safety, including on a possible social media ban for under-16s.

top.title: Stroke survivors trial new at-home tech: 'It's given me my freedom back'
top.summary: Participants in the NHS 'Triceps' trial wear a device in their ear which emits electrical pulses while they do rehab.

top.title: John Wick game starring Keanu Reeves unveiled at PlayStation showcase
top.summary: It's not the first time the iconic hitman has appeared in games, but Saber's will be the first voiced by Reeves.
